post.text: Hillary and Tim Kaine take the stage in Philadelphia at their first campaign rally as the official Democratic Party ticket.

comment.author: Bo
comment.text: A Great Team, Hillary/Kaine, let's turn Texas Blue for all the right reasons, VOTE 👍🏻🇺🇸🇺🇸

replies.author: Ashley
replies.text: Yes! It's time for Texas to be BLUE!
